translations: n．笑话，玩笑：用以逗乐或引人发笑的言语或行为。
· He told a few jests to lighten the mood.
他讲了几个笑话，让气氛轻松起来。
v．开玩笑，戏谑：以言语或行为逗乐他人。
· She jests with her friends all the time.
她总是和朋友们开玩笑。

sentences.sentence: He jests me on my folly.
Mary always jests about her feelings towards him.
sentences.translation: 玛丽总是拿她对他的感情开玩笑。

sentences.sentence: Mary always jests about her feelings towards him.
sentences.translation: 玛丽总是拿她对他的感情来开玩笑。
